attributes.action: create a law similar to the US Sarbanes-Oxley Act for government agencies in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Corporate fraud in the US during the years 2000-2002 cost an estimated $500billion in market decline. As a result accounting practices were established under law that made those responsible for such fraud to take place to be better penalised & monitored more openly. With the most recent in a wave of security lapses perpetrated by the HMRC we the people require similar laws to be instituted to remove fraudulent & faulty business practices at the highest level of government – the same people who are requiring more and more of our personal details. 
We demand full accountability of all government departments with a more independent & empowered national audit office presiding and a constitutional duty of care in all areas of governance.
